site_name: LEWISHAM GATEWAY, LEWISHAM HIGH STREET, LONDON, SE13
description: Observation requested by London Borough of Lewisham for application submitted under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for Minor Material Amendments in connection with the planning permission DC/06/62375 (granted on 8 May 2009) for the comprehensive mixed use redevelopment of the Lewisham Gateway Site, SE13 (land between Rennell Street and Lewisham Railway Station) for up to 100,000m² comprising retail (A1, A2, A3, A4 and A5), offices (B1), hotel (C1), residential (C3), education/health (D1) and leisure (D2) with parking and associated infrastructure, as well as open space and water features. The amendments comprise the reduction of the overall floorspace to 97,545m², amendments to the floorspace allocated to the approved uses, introduction of co-living accommodation (sui generis) and co-working/business space (B1), amendments to the physical parameters of Blocks C1, C2, D1, D2 and E including increasing the height of blocks, changes to the footprints and massing, omission of Block F and basement car parking, and associated changes.
